name: 章韶洵
objective: This course "Introduction to Music" is intend to give an introductory survey on Western classical music. We will listen to and explore some important musical pieces of different periods from the medieval to the modern. Other topics include Chinese music and world music. Through this course, students will become familiar with the musical language and hopefully gain a lifelong interest in music as an art form.
schedule:
week 1 Introduction 
week 2 Piano Music
week 3 Musical “Princesses and Princes’ Awarding Ceremony” 
week 4 The Endless Possibilities of Percussions
week 5 The Art of Swing
week 6 Pipa Family in Asia
week 7 Violin - Its Making & Music
week 8 Musical Forms
week 9 Midterm Exam
week 10 Film Music
week 11 Opera!
week 12 Christmas Music
week 13 When Music Meets Dance
week 14 Presentation 1
week 15 Visiting National Symphony Orchestra Rehearsal
week 16 Presentation 2
week 17 New Year's Day
week 18 Final exam week
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam 20%
Final presentation 30%
Select any two lecture topics, and write a short (2 pages, double-spaced) response to the lecture content 20%
Students are expected to attend a live concert of classical music and write a report 20%
Attendance and class participation 10%
